i18n.key: Shipping area; select an area from the resources.
Billing area; select an area in the resources.
The default catalogue is the one used on pages when no catalogue has been defined. There can only be one default catalogue per website.
when displaying, the symbol may be placed to the left or the right of the amount.
Indicates whether the price incl. taxes should be displayed in this catalogue.
Indicates whether the price excl. taxes should be displayed in this catalogue.
Default product visual element in detail mode (display of a product sheet).
Default product visual element in list mode.

For performance reasons, all the catalogue data (departments, products, prices, etc.) must be compiled. This action, which can take a long time depending on the size of the catalogue, is necessary if changes were made to the catalogue or departments.
